    • Method Detail

      • shake

        public void shake(float duration,
                  float shakeIntensity,
                  int shakes,
                  boolean smooth)
        Parameters:
        duration - The duration in seconds of the shake
        shakeIntensity - The intensity. 0 means no shake at all. No value higher than 1 is recommended.
        shakes - Number of shakes in the given duration. 1 Shake means translation right and left and back to middle.
        smooth - Should the shake ease in and out?

      • getTranslation

        public final vine.math.vector.Vec3f getTranslation()
        Returns:
        The world translation of the camera.
